Captain.Title: John Harriman
Captain.Ability: During the Activation Phase, you may perform an [EVADE] Action as a free Action. If you do so, place Auxilary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Kohlar
Captain.Ability: Your Captain Skill number increases by +2 for each damage card assigned to your ship (max +4). If the damage to your ship is repaired, your Skill Number decreases accordingly. You may field the "Kuvah'Magh" [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade at a cost of -2.
